title: Clipped Video Passed Off as BJP Leader’s Threat to Journalists
subtitle: Fact Check of a Clipped Video Passed off as BJP Leader’s Open Threat to Kill Journalists: The claim along with the video is false. The video in circulation is a trimmed version of the 26 minute-long video uploaded by ‘Times of Today’.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A viral video on social media claims that the man in the video, allegedly a BJP leader, is giving an “open threat to kill journalists”.

In the 1-minute-22-second video, he can be heard urging the reporter to not ask questions that are anti-government and anti-BJP, else he will be “lying somewhere like Gauri Lankesh’s brother.”

He says, “आपके सवाल से हमको लगता है की आपको अपने परिवार से डर नहीं लगता है क्या? आप किसके शासनकाल में और किसके विरोध में सवाल कर रहे हैं ये आप नहीं समझ रहे हैं, मैं बता दे रहा हूँ शायद भूल गए होंगे | आप पुराने हिंदुस्तान में नहीं जी रहे हैं, आप बदलते हुए हिंदुस्तान में जी रहे हैं.” (Translated: Hearing your question, it seems that you are not scared about your family. You are not understanding that you are asking this under whose governance and against whom. I will tell you, maybe you have forgotten, you are not living in old India, you are living in changing India.)
